definitions.definition: A device measuring the time of day by the position of a shadow cast by a pole or plate ( gnomon ) upon an engraved series of marks .
examples: The birdbath includes a small gnomon that acts as a sundial with markings on the basin if it's aligned correctly with the sun.

main_definition: A device measuring the time of day by the position of a shadow cast by a pole or plate ( gnomon ) upon an engraved series of marks .
